title: madhva madada
sahitya:
madhva madada siddhAntada baddhati biDabEDa biDbEDa biTTu keDabEDa keDabEDa


anupallavi

  biTTare yama benneTTuva mUDha


caraNam 1    hari sarvOttamanahudemba jnAnavanaridu bALvudake parataravAda mata
    caraNam 2    ghOra yamana bhaya dUra Odisi murAriya caraNava sErO sanmArgava
    caraNam 3    bhAratIsha mukhya prANAntargata nIrajAkSa purandara viTTala
